name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Char's red mobile suit is called the Sazabi.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Char leads a faction known as Neo-Zeon, made up of soldiers once loyal to the Zeon forces who lost the One Year War. Char's favorite color is red, and he wears the color often. His mobile suits are also commonly red.

questions.text: What ship is Bright Noa captain of?
questions.explanation:
Ra Cailum.

	The Londo Bell was the name of a special task force sent to stop Char's Neo-Zeon forces. Their headquarters was the Ra Cailum, whose captain was Bright Noa.

questions.text: What is the name of Bright Noa's son?
questions.explanation:
Hathaway.

	Hathaway Noa is a young student who is sent to live with his father in space once it seems the Earth is under imminent attack from Char's Neo-Zeon forces. He would later pilot the Xi Gundam.

Gyunei Guss.

	Gyunei Guss is an artificial Newtype, a human who has undergone treatment to increase their mental awareness. Both Char Aznable and Amuro Ray are natural Newtypes.

questions.text: What is the name of the asteroid Char intends to drop on the Earth?
questions.explanation:
Axis.

	Dropping Axis onto Earth would cause a new ice age, forcing Earth's population to migrate into space.

questions.text: In what year of the Universal Century timeline do the events of the movie take place?
questions.explanation:
0093.

	The original "Mobile Suit Gundam" series takes place in UC 0079, and the sequel "Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam" takes place in 0086.

questions.text: Chan Agi is Amuro Ray's love interest in the movie.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Chan is another Londo Bell officer who is smitten with Amuro. She gives him the Nu Gundam.

options: New York, United States of America
questions.explanation:
Lhasa, Tibet.

	On the way down, Fifth Luna passes dangerously close to a shuttle carrying bureaucrat Adenauer Paraya and his daughter Quess, who will later become a mobile suit pilot.

questions.text: Rezin Schnyder leads an attack on the Ra Cailum in this mobile suit.
questions.explanation:
Geara Doga.

	The Geara Doga and Jagd Doga make up most of Neo-Zeon's mobile suit forces. In comparison, the Londo Bell taskforce is made up mostly of Re-GZ mobile suits.

questions.text: Where is Char supposed to surrender his fleet?
questions.explanation:
Luna II.

	Char cuts a deal with Earth Federation officials. He will surrender his fleet if he is given posession of the mining asteroid Axis. Char does not send his real fleet, using balloons instead. His actual fleet heads toward Axis and seizes control.
